name: telegram-openai-bot
description: A Telegram bot powered by OpenAI/Anthropic. Deploy your own instance in one click via Railway.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenAI or Anthropic

OPEN_AI_ENDPOINT.description: Optional API endpoint override, e.g. https://api.anthropic.com/v1/
